pageContext.claim: “One of the big things we just did is we had a great meeting, as you know, and a very successful one with North Korea. … We're getting our -- the remains back of our great heroes. There have been -- so many people asked me, 'Could you do it?' The remains are coming back. They have over 200 already.”
pageContext.analysis: The remains of 200 U.S. soldiers lost in the Korean War had not been returned when Trump said this.
